metrics.name: Feature Interpretability
metrics.description: Model features are well-documented and interpretable

metrics.name: Decision Explanation
metrics.description: Model decisions can be explained using SHAP values

metrics.name: Demographic Parity
metrics.description: Model predictions are balanced across demographic groups

metrics.name: Equal Opportunity
metrics.description: True positive rates are similar across groups

metrics.name: Adversarial Resistance
metrics.description: Model is resistant to adversarial attacks

metrics.name: Distribution Shift
metrics.description: Model performs well under data distribution shifts

metrics.name: Model Logging
metrics.description: Comprehensive logging of model decisions and changes

metrics.name: Audit Trail
metrics.description: Complete audit trail of model development and deployment
